WelcomeInvite.title: Welcome to Catena-X!
WelcomeInvite.message: Hello {{you}}! Your company is now officially registered to the network and you can start your technical onboarding journey now.

WelcomeUser.title: Welcome to Catena-X!
WelcomeUser.message: Hello {{you}}! You have been added to Catena-X. The community welcomes you and is looking forward to your contributions.

WelcomeAppMarketplace.title: Check out the App Marketplace
WelcomeAppMarketplace.message: By the way {{you}}, at the App Marketplace you find useful apps for common use cases.

AppRecommendation.title: Someone recommended an app to you
AppRecommendation.message: Hey {{you}}, {{user}} recommended the app {{app}} to you: {{message}}.
